mapper.select: select fo.order_number as orderNumber, f.food_price as unitPrice from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id where fo.student_id = #{studentId} and DATE(fo.order_time) = CURDATE()

select fo.order_number as orderNumber, f.food_price as unitPrice from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id where fo.student_id = #{studentId} and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(fo.order_time)

select fo.order_number as orderNumber, f.food_price as unitPrice from forder fo inner join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id where fo.student_id = #{studentId} and date_format(fo.order_time, '%Y-%m') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m')
